title: Jared, anything special about today? like maybe a BIRTHDAY, like?
content:
:-)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/home_JARED_4990.gif)

ChrisL

 [‹ Boat Name](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33140 "Go to previous forum topic") [Searching for freestylisch set typo in books ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33075 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content:
He was always a jewel to us type freaks :-P

ChrisL
Happy Birthday!

Happy Birthday + flowersandchocolate  
ChrisL is always a jewel to us type freaks :-P

A-ha, you cannot escape us. Happy Birthday! Cake everyone!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HBDJB_3579.gif)
Happy Birthday, Jared! Thanks for giving all of us a gathering place. :^)
Happy birthday, Jared. All the best and thanks for Typophile!

Thanks everyone! But I can’t take all the credit, for there’s another birthday in our midst.

Happy Birthday Typophile! Typophile turns 7 today. (Hmm, what’s that in TYPE years?)
Happy Birthday!

Seven years of Typophile? Now that is a Type High! :-)

ChrisL
Happy birthday, Jared!
Happy Birthday! What’s with the spaced script dezcom? Inside joke?

Koleslaw,

Follow this link for the original:

[http://www.jared.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/StoreCatalogDisplay?catal...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003/http:/www.jared.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/StoreCatalogDisplay?catalogId=10451&storeId=10451&langId=-1 "http://www.jared.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/StoreCatalogDisplay?catalogId=10451&storeId=10451&langId=-1")

After all, Jared is kind of a diamond in the rough :-)

ChrisL

Happy, happy, birthday, birthday, Jared, Typophile.

Dav

Warm birthday wishes to Jared and his baby, Typophile.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/typophile_bday_4971.jpg)
Oh, right. I know their commercials all too well.

So your birthday is the same as Typophile’s?! A conspiracy, I tell you...

HAPPY BIRTHDAY, dear friend to fonts.

hhp
A belated happy birthday!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005003im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hbd_4711.jpg)

Eres una joya, Jared! :-)

Many happy returns, fella, to both you and Typophile.
Happy birthday, Jared!
A little late... but Happy Belated from one Jared to another!
